name: Mount Athos
startIntroPart1: Athanasius the Athonite, you were a brilliant theologian who helped establish the monastic tradition in the Eastern Roman Empire. You believed that the spiritual life was the key to defeating the spiritual darkness that he saw in the world around You. Your most well-known work, The Life of Saint Anthony, is considered one of the first biographies of Anthony the Great, and helped to establish the monastic tradition in the Eastern Roman Empire. It is a masterpiece of spirituality and a testament to the power of the monastic life.
startIntroPart2: Athanasius, Will Your Knowledge About Theology and Spirituality, Lead Mount Athos Into a Center of Culture and Faith, or will You let The Invaders Raid Mount Athos, and Left Nothing behind?
declaringWar: There Nothing left in Your Mind, and I Shall Save You and your people From The earthly Life.
attacked: Doesn't Matter, I have The Holy Spirit Within Me and With it i shall Conquer Sin like You.
defeated: Plague, Plague, Is There Nothing Can be Done?
introduction: Greetings, I'm Athanasius the Athonite from There Mountains, Please Look Around.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
